articles.title: Bill Belichick among 9 coaching semifinalists for Pro Football Hall of Fame’s 2026 class
articles.description:
This is Belichick's first time being eligible for the Hall of Fame.

The post Bill Belichick among 9 coaching semifinalists for Pro Football Hall of Fame’s 2026 class appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill Belichick is nominated for the Pro Football Hall of Fame's 2026 class.
This marks Belichick's first eligibility for the Hall of Fame.
Boston residents celebrate Belichick's legacy as Patriots' head coach and his potential induction.

articles.title: What to know about the deadly UPS plane crash in Louisville, Kentucky
articles.description:
Video showed the plane’s left wing was on fire when it took off, moments before it crashed into an industrial area at the end of the runway.

The post What to know about the deadly UPS plane crash in Louisville, Kentucky appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: UPS plane crashed in Louisville, Kentucky, after takeoff on November 5, 2025.
The plane's left wing was on fire before crashing into an industrial area.
Boston residents may face delays in UPS deliveries due to the incident.

articles.title: Boston police now required to wear nametags under new contract extension
articles.description:
"Real public safety requires transparency, and knowing someone’s name makes a difference," Mayor Michelle Wu said.

The post Boston police now required to wear nametags under new contract extension appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston police must wear nametags as part of a new contract extension.
Mayor Michelle Wu emphasizes transparency and accountability in public safety efforts.
This policy aims to enhance community trust and improve police-civilian interactions.

articles.title: The backlash has arrived: 6 takeaways from a good night for Democrats
articles.description:
The results served as a rebuke of Trump and his Republican Party and a salve for Democrats who have not had many good nights in the past year.

The post The backlash has arrived: 6 takeaways from a good night for Democrats appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Democrats experienced a significant electoral win, marking a shift in local political dynamics.
The results reflect growing discontent with Trump among Boston voters, impacting future elections.
Local Democratic leaders see this as a chance to regain momentum and address community issues.
